unnormalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Hunting Just Got Easier!
normalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Hunting Just Got Easier!

unnormalised: Tired of scrolling through endless websites for that perfect scholarship? Well, cheer up! A wave of new scholarship portals are making waves in the EdTech scene, promising to simplify the whole process.
normalised: Tired of scrolling through endless websites for that perfect scholarship? Well, cheer up! A wave of new scholarship portals are making waves in the EdTech scene, promising to simplify the whole process.

unnormalised: Think of these portals as your personal scholarship guru, like that helpful Sharma uncle who always knows someone. These platforms are consolidating information on various scholarships, from the PM Scholarship Scheme to those offered by private institutions like IIT Delhi.
normalised: Think of these portals as your personal scholarship guru, like that helpful Sharma uncle who always knows someone. These platforms are consolidating information on various scholarships, from the P M Scholarship Scheme to those offered by private institutions like I I T Delhi.

unnormalised: They even personalize searches based on your interests, caste, academic performance, and financial background. Forget spending hours searching; these portals filter through tons of options, presenting you with those relevant to you – whether it’s for that coding course or your MBA dreams in IIM Ahmedabad!
normalised: They even personalize searches based on your interests, caste, academic performance, and financial background. Forget spending hours searching; these portals filter through tons of options, presenting you with those relevant to you – whether it’s for that coding course or your M B A dreams in I I M Ahmedabad!

unnormalised: Dr. Meera Patel, an education specialist, says, "These portals are a boon. They level the playing field, ensuring even students in remote areas like Bastar can access opportunities."
normalised: Doctor Meera Patel, an education specialist, says, "These portals are a boon. They level the playing field, ensuring even students in remote areas like Bastar can access opportunities."

unnormalised: Many portals also offer resources like essay writing tips and mock interviews. Plus, they help you track deadlines, ensuring you don't miss out on that sweet Rs. 50,000 scholarship. One even boasts a campus of 10,000 sq ft in Bangalore! Talk about EdTech innovation!
normalised: Many portals also offer resources like essay writing tips and mock interviews. Plus, they help you track deadlines, ensuring you don't miss out on that sweet rupee fifty thousand scholarship. One even boasts a campus of ten thousand square feet in Bangalore! Talk about EdTech innovation!
